name: Neurosurf
description:
Neurosurf is a game Yee and I developed for ScoreSpace Jam #11.

It is a 2D infinite runner set in a cyberpunk environment.

Controls:

Use Up/Down or W/S to teleport between lanes.
Use Left/Right or A/D to creep forward and backwards in your lane. (Note, this becomes less useful as the game progresses.)
Hold the Spacebar to teleport forwards in your lane and release it to teleport back.

Score values:

Passively gain 1 point per second.
Fuel is worth 30 points.
Stars are worth 200 points
Flight rewards you with 1000 points
